title: 「文宣組請接手」外國報紙comment section需要幫手

replies.msg:
唔該文宣組有外國報紙account嘅成員麻煩上一上去宣揚返一啲正確資訊俾外國人或者係其他讀者。
上面有提及到班狗插贜稼禍、200000人撐警遊行等等嘅不正確資訊，要贏民意什至係外國人支持我地好需要係依啲平台做好教育一環。
同埋最好有英文好嘅ching幫手睇咗先跟手再fact check，柒咗好大鑊。不過細佬英文唔好，衝咗出去...

知道大家有自己原因唔可以上前線，希望可以各師其職，幫香港救香港。不割蓆不分化不篤灰。

麻煩大家幫手推，推嘅時候講725元朗見。又或者係有account可以提供嘅就留一留tg(? 唔太了解文宣聯絡方式，有錯請指正。

屌你老母鄉黑，依條數你今個星期還撚硬。

Talking about facts:
200000 were on the streets for the police, none special traffic arrangements had to be made.

“338000”, according to your credible source, were on the streets rallying against the noxious extradition bill. The whole Hong Kong Island was paralysed.
Facts are not what they feed, facts are what you observe with bare eyes.

Talking about facts:
Law enforcers claimed to have only applied adequate level of armoury and pressure, perhaps they meant on joints and sinews, on the “violent rioters”. Nevertheless, these composed officers fired rubber bullets and tear gas, aiming at heads not torso, from pedestrian footbridges and within lethal range. Foreign riots experts, maybe not so foreign to you all, disagreed with such methodology nor strategies.

On the other hand, these retarded protestors who cannot feed themselves came out just to disrupt and rupture the law and order, which apparently was voided by the government itself, cleared way for ambulances and other civilians. Yet, policemen threw tear gas cans into first-aid spots and forbid ambulances from entering the scene for rescue purposes.

I disapprove of what you say, but I shall defend to the death your right of expressing. I do believe everyone do take a stance, but please, in such moral crisis, choose wisely base on the very true facts
大家係各大報紙嘅世界版應該都會睇到，冇嘅份報紙就咪撚再訂啦
